игра улет, при запуске "соревновательный" каждый в друг друга на базе стреляет с криками "это война братан" и кто победил тот победил, только я тащил но мы проиграли.

[h1] CS:GO me arruino la vida [/h1]

Gracias al counter strike soy [spoiler] Racista [/spoiler]  y toxico ql. Ademas lograr perder toda esperanza en ponerla y hablar con mujeres.

[b] Pros: [/b]

- Tienen Gallinas (lo mas importante)
- Nada mas

[b] Cons: [/b]

- Tienen mas chiteros que la conchetumadre.
- Existen personas que pegan mas que padrastro alcoholico.
- Tienen a los brasileños.
- Le quitaron los BOTS ¿¡PORQUE MIERDA?!
- Me dejaron secuelas en el dia a dia tales como: 
Hablar siempre del csgo a mis amigos.
Siempre acuchillar a las gallinas que vea en la calle.
Tener mas toxicidad que la mierda.
Subir 40 kilos.
Tener mas sueños relacionados con el counter que con la vida cotidiana.


[h2] CONCLUSION [/h2]

vale mierda pero lo quiero
The only game I didn't get bored of since my childhood.
Parabéns Valve. Conseguiram piorar oque já estava ruim...
It is Very fun and good game!

Counter Strike continues and will continue for quite some time being the best FPS available on the market.
It manages to be a modern game, optimized for most PCs and a beautiful way to gather your friends to exchange some shots.
However, what spoils the game is the toxic audience. Just like football, which is an absolutely fantastic and accessible sport, Counter Strike has the same characteristics, and the downside is that all kinds of people are in it, including many ignorant people who are inside the game just to mess up their Gameplay or use some kind of anti-game.
Still, I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to take a shot, as there is no similar game on the market.
